TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Hamad_bin_Isa_bin_Salman_Al_Khalifa, title = Hamad_bin_Isa_bin_Salman_Al_Khalifa, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamad_bin_Isa_bin_Salman_Al_Khalifa} }

S.FORM: I 1950 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 28 a romi'ad masofoc ci Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Bahrain anini i ci Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, patirengan a romi'ad i 1999 a miheca saka 3 folad saka 6 a romi'ad.

I 1950 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 28 a romi'ad masofoc ci Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Bahrain anini i ci Hamad bin Isa bin Salman Al Khalifa, patirengan a romi'ad i 1999 a miheca saka 3 folad saka 6 a romi'ad.
